ygData.subject: Re: {Guilds} Dragon Guild on Bertoxxulous?
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a member of the Wrath of the Dragonclaw Clan, but we are not solely Veeshan worshippers.  We are a two server guild (Bertoxxulous and Prexus) that has
ygData.messageBody:
I am a member of the Wrath of the Dragonclaw Clan, but we are not solely
Veeshan worshippers. We are a two server guild (Bertoxxulous and Prexus)
that has different areas of study/concern associated with dragon types.
It's a great guild and we help each other out a great deal (with hunting,
trade skills, getting items we need, etc.) We have lots of fun and would
love to have both of you if you find it suits your needs. Have you checked
out the website? Anyhow, I find that agnostic is great for choosing to play
what you really want to play (role-playing, what a concept!) I chose
agnostic, but claim that it is only a term used by non-believers in my deity
"The Greater Unknown" , because they don't understand that there is a god
above even theirs.

Anyhow, I was disappointed with the lack of religious options as well
(although I suppose I do understand some reasoning for such on Verant's
part). I wish you both the best and I hope you find a guild that will make
you as happy as mine has made me. If you have any other questions, let me
know.

Dietrich of Neriak
Wrath of the Dragonclaw Clan (Prexus branch)

> ----------
> From: rich.hitz@...[SMTP:rich.hitz@...]
> Reply To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 1:16 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] {Guilds} Dragon Guild on Bertoxxulous?
>
> From: rich.hitz@...
>
> To be honest, I don't remember what Diety I chose for my
> Enchanter, but my wife chose Veeshan for hers. I am
> asking so we can join a guild together. I was able to
> find a guild called Wrath of Dragonclaw Clan.
> Any others are welcome. :)
>
> Artimis.
> > Hmm... I've been very curious about Veeshan myself. I know very few who
> > worship the Great Wyrm. How do NPCs feel about you? Are illusions
> > difficult for you (some deities aren't liked by certain people, but I've
> > never heard if anyone likes or doesn't like Veeshan)? Just curious,
> because
> > I know it's a rarely chosen deity and very little information exists
> about
> > the worship of the Dragon. I seriously considered Veeshan-worship, but
> > wasn't sure how others would react to that.
> >
> > Dietrich of Neriak
> > "The only thing more dangerous than a question is an answer"
> >
> > > ----------
> > > From: rich.hitz@...[SMTP:rich.hitz@...]
> > > Reply To: eqenchanters@onelist.com

> > > From: rich.hitz@...

> > > Anyone out there know of a guild that worships Veeshan
> > > on the Bertoxxulous server? My wife and I are looking
> > > to join one but have yet to find one on Bert. Thanks
> > > for all your help. :)
> > >
> > > Artimis
> > > 2nd Rank Enchanter
